title: So are these radioactive
selftext:
Saw a video on how people are making pendants, bracelets out of radioactive materials claiming it to me made of lava and some negative ion bs.. 
And I had got the necklace has a gift years back... I remember wearing it for almost a year and then it's been lying with my precious jewelry ,'(
comments:
They are sold on Amazon and flipkart 
I'm not defaming anyone... 
But they are sold has Quantum Science Fusion Lava Pendents or something similar
Just not sure if they are radioactive as claimed in the video or not but please be aware
